Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18.server.controller

Class PlayerManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18.server.controller.PlayerManager
public class PlayerManager
extends java.lang.Object
class that deals with the layer information such as divinity and turns

      Class constructor, initializes the and the playerData

      playerData - data of the player

    • PlayerManager

      public PlayerManager​(Match match, PlayerData playerData, java.lang.String divinity)
      Class constructor, initializes the and the playerData
      Parameters:
      match - the match reference (unique for all players)
      playerData - data of the player
      divinity - the name of the choosen divinity

  • Method Details

    • divinityCreation

      public void divinityCreation​(java.lang.String divinityName)
      Called from the constructor, create a divinity of the correct type given by the player
      Parameters:
      divinityName - string representing the name of the divinity to be created

    • placeWorker

      public void placeWorker​(java.lang.Integer x, java.lang.Integer y)
      After creating the player, place a worker in the given position do nothing if there are already 2 workers placed
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate in the map of the worker to be placed
      y - the y coordinate in the map of the worker to be placed

    • getWorker

      public Worker getWorker​(java.lang.Integer workerID)
      Get a worker from the model with the given id
      Parameters:
      workerID - the index of the worker to return (0 or 1)
      Returns:
      the selected worker

    • setBuild

      public void setBuild​(java.lang.Integer X, java.lang.Integer Y, java.lang.Boolean dome)
      Build up a floor on the selected cell or place a dome on it
      Parameters:
      X - the x coordinate of the building cell
      Y - the y coordinate of the building cell
      dome - true if a dome is to be built, false if a normal building is to be built

    • setBuild

      public void setBuild​(java.lang.Integer X, java.lang.Integer Y)
      Build up a floor on the selected cell
      Parameters:
      X - the x coordinate of the building cell
      Y - the y coordinate of the building cell

    • manageTurn

      public void manageTurn​(boolean raiseForbidden)
      Call the relative function into the specific player divinity controller
      Parameters:
      raiseForbidden - true if Athena moved up and so you cannot move up in the turn
